sentences.en: "Keep him outside till I give you the nod."
sentences.cn: “没我同意，别让他进来。”

sentences.en: A breakfast will be served to those who last out till dawn!
sentences.cn: 坚持到天亮的能吃上早餐！

sentences.en: Alex didn't read fluently till he was nearly seven.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯快到7岁时才能流利地阅读。

sentences.en: He checked the register. There was money in the till.
sentences.cn: 他查看了一下收银机的抽屉，里面有钱。

sentences.en: he was caught with his hand in the till and sacked.
sentences.cn: 他在单位行窃时被当场抓住并被解雇。

sentences.en: I didn’t have a boyfriend till I was 17.
sentences.cn: 我直到17岁才有男朋友。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: I went on competing till I was in my middle forties.
sentences.cn: 我继续参赛，直到45岁左右。

sentences.en: I'd sooner he didn't know till I've talked to Pete.
sentences.cn: 在我跟皮特说之前，我宁愿他不知道这件事。

sentences.en: It'sa bit tricky at first till you get the hang of it.
sentences.cn: 刚开始有点儿难，掌握窍门后就好了。

sentences.en: Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream.
sentences.cn: 卢就各种芝麻小事唠叨个没完，后来我烦得都想尖叫了。

sentences.en: Nobody else turned up till a quarter past ten.
sentences.cn: 直到10点一刻，其他人才露面。

sentences.en: She'd been working in her room till a noise had disturbed her.
sentences.cn: 她一直在房间里工作，直到有声响打扰了她。

sentences.en: The shop’s open till nine o’clock on Fridays.
sentences.cn: 这家商店周五营业到9点。

sentences.en: They reviewed for the term examination till late at night.
sentences.cn: 他们为期未考试复习功课直到深夜。

sentences.en: They slept till the alarm bleeper woke them at four.
sentences.cn: 他们一直睡到4点钟被寻呼机闹钟叫醒.

sentences.en: We could still make it, but we won't get there till three.
sentences.cn: 我们仍然可以赶去，只不过要到3点钟才能到。

sentences.en: We waited till twelve and we finally got on the plane.
sentences.cn: 我们一直等到12点才终于上了飞机。

sentences.en: You keep as much money as you need in the till to run your operations.
sentences.cn: 你做业务要储备足够的钱。

sentences.en: You really can't comment till you know the facts.
sentences.cn: 知道真相之前，不要发表任何意见。

words.tran_cn: [地理][水文]冰碛；放钱的抽屉；[会计]备用现金

phrases.phrase: have (或 with) one's fingers (或 hand) in the till

trans.tran_en: money in the till is money that a company or organization has
to prepare land for growing crops
